structure.unit: Inland Fisheries And Game And Other Natural Resources

law.catch_line: Protection Of Property By Owner Or Tenant; Transportation Of Firearms To Or From Range
law.text: Nothing in section sixty-six or sixty-seven shall be construed to prohibit an owner or tenant of land or his authorized agent, as provided in section thirty-seven from protecting his property nor prohibit a person from transporting firearms or ammunition to or from the commonwealth or to or from any range.
